home_extend_description: Enhance the experience in your globalization apps with plugins and lint rules, seamlessly adapting to your project needs.
home_extend_lint_description: Validate content of an inlang project right from the App you are using.
home_extend_plugins_description: Change or extend inlang app behavior with custom plugins.
home_guides_description: If you're looking to explore the ecosystem, we have guides available to help you. Be sure to check them out!
home_inlang_description: Inlang is an ecosystem of interoperable lix apps that solve use cases around software globalization. One setup, multiple apps, incrementally adoptable.
home_lix_automation_description: Out of the box automations can transform in highly customizable processes.
home_lix_collaboration_description: Everyone in the team can work seamlessly together on the same data.
home_lix_desc: No matter which inlang app is used, you have complete control over your translation data, ensuring quality and consistency in your global strategy.
home_lix_recovery_description: Always go back before things went wrong.
home_lix_review_description: Include who is needed inside a flexible review workflow.
home_lix_traceability_description: Know why a decision was made and how things evolved.
home_personas_designer_cards_parrot_desc: Parrot simplifies the translation management process right within Figma.
home_personas_designer_main_description:
If you deal with multilingual design projects and want to streamline your
								translation workflow, this plugin is for you!
home_personas_title: Different Use Cases. Many Apps. One Ecosystem.
home_personas_translator_cards_badge_des: Show missing messages in a markdown file.
home_personas_translator_guide_descripti: A Beginner guide that helps translators.
inlang_global_description: Quickly find the best solution to globalize (i18n) your app. inlang helps you to expand to new markets and acquire new customers.
inlang_global_title: inlang - The ecosystem to go global
inlang_twitter_title: inlang's ecosystem helps organizations to go global.
marketplace_application_header_generic_d: A general guide on the minimum steps required to make your project ready for the ecosystem of inlang.
marketplace_application_header_svelte_de: A basic guide on how to adopt inlang with paraglide.js and message-format-plugin in your Svelte app.
marketplace_application_header_svelte_ti: Build a global Svelte app: A basic guide

The lix change control system is a system that allows you to run git in as a backend for
